iti81:2.1: “Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta sakkarena abhibhuta, pariyadinnacitta, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna.
iti81:3.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta asakkarena abhibhuta, pariyadinnacitta, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna.
iti81:4.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta sakkarena ca asakkarena ca tadubhayena abhibhuta, pariyadinnacitta, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna.
iti81:5.1: Tam kho panaham, bhikkhave, nannassa samanassa va brahmanassa va sutva vadami;
iti81:5.2: (…) api ca, bhikkhave, yadeva me samam natam samam dittham samam viditam tamevaham vadami.
iti81:6.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta sakkarena abhibhuta, pariyadinnacitta, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna.
iti81:7.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta asakkarena abhibhuta, pariyadinnacitta, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna.
iti81:8.1: Dittha maya, bhikkhave, satta sakkarena ca asakkarena ca tadubhayena abhibhuta, pariyadinnacitta, kayassa bheda param marana apayam duggatim vinipatam nirayam upapanna”ti.
iti81:11.1: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavata, iti me sutanti.
